column1: # Title: States with Missing Offshore Wind Resource Potential
# Units: fraction of total USA offshore wind resource assigned to state
# Comments:  This file list states not included in original offshore wind resource potential data (reeds_offshore_wind_curve_capacity.csv)
# which are being assigned some resource. rsrc_frac is the fraction of the total USA offshore wind resource assigned to that state.

column2: informed by fact that Alaksa resource is not reflected in the original data set (reeds_offshore_wind_curve_capacity.csv)
